alivent-messenger.midnightconfig.title: Aliven't Messenger Settings
alivent-messenger.midnightconfig.intallM: Gives aliven't messages for all mobs, instead of just ones with custom names
alivent-messenger.midnightconfig.village: Gives aliven't messages for all Villagers and Zombie Villagers with trades
alivent-messenger.midnightconfig.loreDro: Gives lore info for items dropped from named mobs
alivent-messenger.midnightconfig.nameCol: The names of the mobs will appear with color
alivent-messenger.midnightconfig.species: The aliven't message for named mobs will display their "species" between parenthesis
alivent-messenger.midnightconfig.alivent: Removes the near-retundant log message of aliven't villagers and custom-named mobs
